comments: Siakam (IND) grabs Hartenstein's (NYK) arms off-ball and the contact affects Hartenstein's ability to defend the oncoming driving shot attempt.
Haliburton (IND) moves laterally into Brunson's (NYK) path and initiates body contact that affects Brunson's SQBR during the drive.
Brunson (NYK) and Nesmith (IND) come together in pursuit of the loose ball and incidental leg-to-leg contact occurs.
Brunson (NYK) and Nesmith (IND) come together in pursuit of the loose ball and marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Nesmith (IND) reaches in and marginal contact occurs with DiVincenzo's (NYK) arm.
Turner (IND) is in the paint for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Nembhard (IND) is moving alongside Brunson's (NYK) path and marginal body contact occurs as they come together during the drive.
Nembhard (IND) jumps alongside Brunson's (NYK) path and avoids making body contact as he contests the driving shot attempt.
Hart (NYK) briefly places his forearm on Siakam's (IND) side and marginal body contact occurs during his driving shot attempt.
DiVincenzo (NYK) blocks the shot attempt after the ball makes contact with the backboard and has a chance to score.
Haliburton (IND) does not place part of his hand underneath the ball as he maintains his dribble.
Nembhard (IND) gathers the ball on his right foot and takes two steps prior to releasing his jump shot attempt.
Nembhard's (IND) hand comes down and marginal contact occurs with Brunson's (NYK) arm prior to his upward shooting motion.
Turner (IND) is drawn into the air on the pump fake toward Brunson (NYK) and incidental foot to foot contact occurs during Brunson's unnatural shooting motion.
Burks (NYK) commits a take foul on Nesmith (IND).
